error.message: Call to deprecated function file_save_htaccess(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Component\FileSecurity\FileSecurity::writeHtaccess() instead.

Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to micro_site.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
